events.body:
Takealot order
You've been wanting a Pikachu V Pokemon TCG card for a while and have even found a few on Amazon for crazy prices. Pappa found a set on Takealot so you placed your first Takealot order. You're very excited for the Takealot motorbike to arrive with something for you.

You've even decided not to tell your friends before you actually get it (though we'll see if you manage to hold out).

You've started a Pokemon craze at school.\n\nFor a while, you've been taking Pokemon cards to school to trade with a few other kids who know about them. Now it seems that the whole Grade 3 and a few other grades have caught on to the craze. All the parents are asking Mamma where to get the cards because "Sean has the best cards"!

Watching the F1 qualifying, Sean sees the pit crew rebuilding Carlos Sainz's car...
Sean: Pappa, if uncle Quintin was a Formula 1 dude...
Pappa: Yes?
Sean: He would be the dude who would drop the tyre on his foot.
Pappa: ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£
First soccer match.\nRivonia Primary vs Bryanston Primary.
Seeing a Yoda in the shop...\nSean: Look Pappa, a yoga.
Watching a video of a shark on Facebook...\nSean: Put a like on it.

Philip: Nerf gun

Caleb: Aerobie

First catch in a cricket match.\nHigh catch at square leg. Everyone was very impressed.
"Pappa, do kings and queens have stretched limbos?"\n\n"Limbos" = limos (limousines)
"Watwarkies" = vlakvarkies
"Pappa, guess what?! I remembered our place mat for the car"\n"Place mat" = The number plate of the rental car we used in Cape Town.

Playing 15 seconds in the car. Sean's clue: "I'm cheeky with it"\nWe all immediately knew you were taking about your phone!
Mamma: what do you want for dinner?\nSean: I don't know, something like junk food. Like Mcdonald's
You woke up early and made yourself lunch for school just for fun: chocolate spread sandwich, banana, Salticrax and a rolled up slice of ham with toothpick.
You played a prank on us by half filling the empty milk with water which had Mamma very confused when she tried to make coffee!
"Koek a looking" = koekeloer

Talking about going on a cruise ship. Sean mentioned he is scared of crashing into an iceberg and sinking.\nMamma and Pappa say that the ocean where we'll go on a ship is warm and there are no icebergs.\n"The fish wee in the ocean and wee is quite warm, so that will melt the icebergs."

Shame, dink Sean het die grootste skrik van sy lewe gekry vanmiddag.

Ons het bal gespeel in die straat voor ons huis, toe skop Sean die bal in groot pad af. Altwee kinders hardloop toe agter die bal aan. Sean wen toe en kry die bal. Anika wip haar stert. Staan wydsbeen in die pad arms gevou.
Bietjie verder af in die pad is 'n kar besig om om te draai om op te ry. Sean skreeu vir Anika "car coming, you have to move" Anika staan. Hande gevou, sy weier om te beweeg. Sean waarsku sy sussie weer 2 keer sy beweeg nie. Ek verder op in pad sien alles.
Die kar het nou klaar omgedraai (maar is nog ver genoeg weg)
 Sean skrik en begin paniekerig raak. Ek worry nie, want kar is nog ver genoeg weg en Anika sal beweeg wanneer kar aan kom maar ek vinnig op pad om te gaan help.
Sean besluit sy Ma is te ver en kar te naby. Hy gryp Anika aan haar baadjie se kappie en begin haar uit die pad uit trek, sy val om maar Sean TREK! En hy hou aan TREK! Anika se broek word afgetrek, Mamma sÃª dis ok Sean los Anika maar Sean trek net harder. Tot Anika uit die pad is en weg van die kar. Toe ons by huis kom bars hy uit in trane want hy het sy sussie seer gemaak. Die arme kind het hom boeglam geskrik en wou sy sussie red van die kar. Al die adrenalien was net te veel vir hom. Hy was hoogs ontsled. Anika sÃª boudvelle is af en haar boude pikswart van vuil pad so toe skrik hy eers. My arme liefling kind

Ons het gister vir Daisy gaan haal. Sean toe hy gaan slaap gisteraand...
Sean: Can she sleep in my bed?
Mamma: Nee, hondjies slaap nie in mense beddens nie.
Sean: But some people put their dogs beds there [wys na voetend van die bed] and then they sleep like that
Pappa: Some people might, but not in our house.
Sean hits a great golf drive...\nPappa: So how did that feel?\nSean: Like power!
"I'm hicking-up" = I'm hiccuping
"Energator" = generator
124cm
Sean: Pappa, when you were a kid, did you like software engineers?\nPappa: (Laughing and impressed).
Slicking your hair down with your hands after drying it...\nSean: Look Pappa, this is what a handsome guy looks like.
Sean: Look Pappa. My camera charges itself when it sleeps.\nPappa: Really?\nSean: Yes, look how much health it has!
Sean and Anika watch their Santa message video and Santa tells them they're on the nice list...\nSean: Come Anika, let's go be good so we can stay on the nice list!
Looking at cheetah\nPappa "hey cheetah, wanna race?"\nSean to pappa "you'll be dinner"

Sean is super impressed that Mamma has bought him some boxer shorts like Pappa. You look so big sleeping in them with a t shirt. You even say that you're going to come cuddle with Pappa on the weekend when it's warm, then we'll throw the blanket off and both be wearing boxers!
Sean: Pappa, what can I do?\nPappa: Why don't you do some jumpoline tramping?\nSean: Hmm
"mystery dot" = ? (a question mark)

Sean: Pappa, I love you.
Pappa: Sean, guess what?
Sean: I love you too?
Pappa: Nah, the grass is green.
Sean: Oh.
Pappa: Guess what else?
Sean: I love you too?
Pappa: No, the sky is blue.
Sean: Aw.
Pappa: Guess what else?
[Pappa planning to say "The sun is yellow" when you say "I love you too"]...
Sean: The sun is yellow.
Pappa: No, I love you too!
Both: Hahahaha!
Sean: If we have a small cake, and we shoot it with a big zapinator, then it will be huuuuge!
Watching Dennis the Menace, the bad guy gets pretty hurt...\nSean: Good, he got all the sore he needed.

Sean and Anika cleaning up in the flat...
Sean: Clean up Anika. You can't leave that in the door.
Anika: Why not?
Sean: Pappa? He's sensitive.
Watching Dennis the Menace...\nPappa: He's almost a naughty as you...\nSean: No, he's way naughtier.

Sean: Hey Google, please show me videos of Pokemon illusions.

Sean: When they evolve.
Pappa. Ah, Pokemon evolutions!

First round of golf. 9 holes at Huddle Park Mashie course with Alex.

Getting out the car at the shop...

Pappa: Why not?
Sean: Because there's no car there. What if a car comes when I'm getting out?
Pappa: Then you'll have to watch and be careful.
Sean: Mmm, or else I'll be cardified!
Borona = Corona, but it's boring, so it's Borona

First time at a driving range and wedge & putt course @ World of Golf in Woodmead. You hit your first shot of the wedge & putt course over water, onto the green, to cheers from 3 young men. Easy game.
Made toast by himself
He was hungry and made it all on his own. No asking

Sean 7 jaar 

1. Wat is die Corona virus?
Germs

No

'Black animal that can fly and a tail like a tadpole and has a pinky reddish eye

Weet nie

'red

RULES FOR SONS:
1. Never shake a man's hand sitting down.
2. Don't enter a pool by the stairs.
3. The man at the BBQ Grill is the closest thing to a king.
4. In a negotiation, never make the first offer.
5. Request the late check-out.
6. When entrusted with a secret, keep it.
7. Hold your heroes to a higher standard.
8. Return a borrowed car with a full tank of gas.
9. Play with passion or not at all...
10. When shaking hands, grip firmly and look them in the eye.
11. Don't let a wishbone grow where a backbone should be.
12. If you need music on the beach, you're missing the point.
13. Carry two handkerchiefs. The one in your back pocket is for you. The one in your breast pocket is for her.
14. You marry the girl, you marry her family.
15. Be like a duck. Remain calm on the surface and paddle like crazy underneath.
16. Experience the serenity of traveling alone.
17. Never be afraid to ask out the best looking girl in the room.
18. Never turn down a breath mint.
19. A sport coat is worth 1000 words.
20. Try writing your own eulogy. Never stop revising.
21. Thank a veteran. Then make it up to him.
22. Eat lunch with the new kid.
23. After writing an angry email, read it carefully. Then delete it.
24. Ask your mom to play. She won't let you win. 
25. Manners maketh the man.
26. Give credit. Take the blame.
27. Stand up to Bullies. Protect those bullied.
28. Write down your dreams.
29. Always protect your siblings (and teammates).
30. Be confident and humble at the same time.
31. Call and visit your parents often. They miss you.

You were very excited to go to your first day of school today. You got ready quickly and posed for some photos at home. At school, you showed some slight trepidation as we were getting out the car but when you saw Mckenzie in the car next to you, you cheered up.
 You were very excited when you saw your classroom and enjoyed putting your bag in your locker which has a green rectangle symbol. Teacher Melissa took you outside to play with the water toys (which was making all the new kids more comfortable). You played for a while and then Andries (who is quite a handful of a kid) splashed you with water. You cried a little and came for a big hug from Mamma and then Pappa. Mamma was doing ok up until that point but got quite emotional at that point. You were quickly ok and we explained that sometimes the other kids will do things like that and that you must just take it in your stride and be nice to them.
You were not worried at all when we said we were leaving. You gave us big hugs and kisses and said goodbye. We hung around for a little while to see that you were ok but you were completely fine and enjoying playing. Mckenzie was not so happy about her parents leaving and she screamed for quite a while. We'll ask you to look after her tomorrow.
Mamma went to fetch you at 13:00 and you were quite tired but enjoyed your day. They couldn't find your shoes which upset you quite a lot because you were so tired. You went home with Mamma and ate some lunch before having a nice afternoon nap. You were so tired that Mamma had to wake you up at 16:00 and even then you struggled. You were in a much better mood and excited to go back to school again tomorrow.
